title: Big Ole Striped Silas
description: Big Ole Striped Silas really puts his best paw forward when a "sweet smelling lady" arrives at the shelter in search of a new housemate. When his dream to find a home comes true, Silas gives his shelter buddies a pep talk to encourage them to not give up hope in finding a home too. Written in rhyme, this book has a very soothing cadence with wonderful illustrations and loved by children and adults alike. Big Ole Striped Silas is the first book in The Silas Series. Available at www.thesilasseries.com
author: Grannie Snow
